text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Heeeey, Trainer! Listen to this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day, as I'm making my rounds<n>throughout the
academy, I spot Smart<n>Falcon running my way with a huge<n>
grin on her face.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna be cheerleading at the<n>next Tracen Meet! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Held twice a year at Tracen Academy,<n>the Tracen Meet is a
race that never<n>fails to attract a crowd. It's one of the<n>
institution's largest events.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Yep! The one and only! There's<n>gonna be sooo many
people coming to<n>watch!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I wonder if I can make all those<n>people my fans if I dance
for them!<n>Ehehe! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later that evening, I run into her a<n>second time, but her
energy is<n>drastically different.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Go, go. You can do it. Let's go. Do it,<n>do it...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm about to call out to her when I<n>notice her talk to another<n>
Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I really wanted to dance,y'know?

text_block_list.name: Dirt-Racing Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Why'd they put us on flag<n>duty anyway?

text_block_list.name: Dirt-Racing Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
"You should do dirt racing!" this.<n>"You're really good at
twirling a flag!"<n>that. It's like we never get a say in<n>what
we do. Nobody's ever gonna<n>notice us at this rate...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It appears the two have been<n>assigned to flag duty instead
of the<n>main cheerleading roles.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As I try to come up with something<n>positive to say...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Well, it is what it is, so we might as<n>well make the most of it
and do our<n>best! C'mon, let's get back to<n>practice!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
So we hold it like this... and spin it like<n>that! Then we do this,
and... voila!<n>Easy as pie!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Their flags flutter in the evening sky.<n>As I watch the two
flag-bearers<n>handle the heavy poles with ease, I<n>begin to
understand why they were<n>assigned that role.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With their practice now complete,<n>Smart Falcon's partner
takes her<n>leave, leaving me free to approach<n>the
now-alone Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Phew... That took way moreenergy than I thought it would... I'mtotally exhausted!
choice_data_list: You twirled that flag like a champ.
You twirled that flag like a champ.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Whoa, Trainer! When did you get<n>here?!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I really did want to showoff my cute dance moves instead of...this.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I guess that's true... Maybe I'll still<n>be able to wow people
like this.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon remains a bit doubtful,<n>but the day of the
Tracen Meet arrives<n>regardless.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Go! Go! You can do it! Let's go! Do it!<n>Do it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon twirls her flag next to<n>the breathtaking
dancers, waiting for<n>her time in the spotlight. When it's<n>
finally her turn, she moves to the<n>center and seizes the
opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Go! Go! YOU CAN DO IT! Let's go! Do<n>it! DO IT!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Wow! Look at her with the flag!<n>She's amazing!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! The way she handles that<n>thing... I've never seen
someone so in<n>sync with their flag!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...Or so I thought.

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Man, these cheerleaders are crazy<n>good! Are you seeing
this?! Tell me<n>who else could pull off a pyramid like<n>that!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, you're right! And look at their<n>beautiful smiles!
They're so cool and<n>cute that I can't take my eyes off<n>
them! ♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Sigh... "The flag-bearers weregreat, but the cheerleaders were thestars of the show!" is all I keep hearing...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I knew I couldn't compete with them...
choice_data_list: You did your best, and that's what matters!
You did your best, and that's what matters!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But they probably won't remember<n>who I am! Maybe
they'll be able to<n>recall the flag's pattern, but not who<n>
waved it...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Some results take time and effort to<n>attain, and becoming a
top Umadol<n>might be one of them.
